title: FreshMe 24K Gold Collagen Under Eye Patch for Women and Men - 20 Pairs Gel Eye Treatment Mask for Eyes Puffiness Anti Aging Removing Bags Deep Hydration Relieve Dark Circles
features: EYE SKIN TREATMENTS: Collagen eye pads can keep moisturizing, reduce laxity and puffiness, fade away dark circles around the eyes, and inflammation caused by allergens. And can help to constrict the blood vessels in the skin under the eyes, which reduces the appearance of dark circles. Further, a cool collagen eye pads can also soothe and firm the skin irritated by cosmetic products or the environment, making it appear healthier.

FULL ESSENCE FOR EYE MOISTURING: FRESHME under eye pads is full of essence, and the material will matain moisture of long periods of time, the gel mask holds in the moisturizing beauty serum, seccessfully delivering it to skin.

SAFE INGREDIENT: There are 5 safe ingradients in our gel eye pads, which are Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid, Retinoids, 24K Gold Powder and Nocotinamide. One of the best things about hyaluronic acid is that it can benefit all skin types. It's obviously hydrating and anti-aging properties for all skins. At the same time, collagen can be quickly absorbed into the skin and works to promote an evenly toned luminosity to the delicate skin surrounding the eyes.

PERFECT SIZE FOR C ZONE: The material, size and shape and retention were carefully chosen and calculated. The shape and size of eye pads were design to included the C Zone in order to treat fine wrinkles and dark circles.

NON SLIPPERY: Our collagen eye pads is non slippery, and you can wear it when you are lying or sitting for watching TV. It won't hinder you to do other things while you are doing eye treatment. Using in the morning for a refreshed look across the entire eye area, which enables a smooth makeup application. Use in the evening to calm and replenish dullness accumulated throughtout the day.
